name: Stifled
detailed_description:
Stifled is a multi-award winning, VR and Mic-Enabled Sound-Based Survival Thriller, where sound is the only way you see and the enemies HEAR your fear.

In Stifled, the sounds made by your in-game character and yourself through *microphone input reveal the otherwise hidden world through ‘echolocation’. However, undue noise will attract the attention of creatures lurking in the darkness. To survive, you will have to tread the line between making sounds to see, and staying quiet to stay hidden. (Put the microphone near your nose for even more challenge!)

*Microphone Input

  • Microphone input is recommended but not necessary.
  • Sound generation can be replaced with a key input if you choose to.

VR Support

  • Stifled currently supports the use of Oculus DK2, Oculus CV1, and HTC VIVE headsets.

Please direct your support questions to our Steam forums.

Stifled is the spiritual successor to our award winning student project, Lurking.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Will not be able to support VR. Playing with a Headset Microphone is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 970 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Will support VR. Playing with a Headset Microphone is recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not tested with VR, Playing with a Headset Microphone is recommended
